text: The , sometimes known as the Japanese Revolution, was a civil war in Japan, fought from 1868 to 1869 between forces of the ruling Tokugawa shogunate and those seeking the Meiji Restoration of political power to the Imperial Court. ==Other websites== * *The Boshin War *The Battle of Ezo Category:Wars involving Japan Category:1868 in Japan Category:1869 in Japan Category:19th- century conflicts
title: Boshin War
